name: Penguin Trooper
text:
2 WATER monsters including a "Penguin" monster
(Quick Effect): Target 1 monster in a zone this card points to; change it to face-down Defense Position, then add 1 "Penguin" card from your GY to your hand. If this card is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can discard 1 "Penguin" card, then draw 2 cards. You can only use each effect of "Penguin Trooper" once per turn.
